name: György Márk Varga
title: Product Developer
bio: I began my software development career in early 2018. With a background in business informatics, I've been passionate about both technology and finance from the start of my career. For me, development isn't just a profession—it's a hobby I genuinely enjoy. As a developer, I constantly explore new technologies and innovative solutions. Beyond coding, I regularly give presentations, conduct training sessions, and appear on podcasts. In my daily work, I focus on AI development and integration, working with technologies like MCP to build intelligent systems that enhance how we interact with applications.
session_titles: Building Remote MCP Servers on AWS and Cloudflare
